data.title: Order of Robert Langdon Books
data.meta_description: This is the Order of Robert Langdon Books in both chronological order and publication order. List verified daily and newest books added immediately.
data.text:
Robert Langdon is a fictional character created by American author Dan Brown. The character appears in multiple Dan Brown novels and the feature films based on Dan Brown’s books – The Da Vinci Code, Angels & Demons and The Lost Symbol. In those movies, the character is portrayed by multiple time Academy Award winning actor Tom Hanks.

Although the three movies were (or will be) released in the order listed above, below is the order in which Dan Brown’s Robert Langdon novels were originally released in:

Get notified when Dan Brown releases a new book at BookNotification.com.

Publication Order of Robert Langdon Books

If You Like Robert Langdon Books, You’ll Love…

The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo

Stephen King

Alex Cross

We do our best to get everything listed but the occasional book gets by us. If you see anything missing please let us know so we can add it ASAP. You can also use this form to request we add new authors. Thanks. You can also e-mail us with any feedback at site@orderofbooks.com.
